## Overview

In this in-class exercise, I will learn to compute spatial weights using R.

## Installing & Loading R Packages

The code chunk below installs and loads tidyverse and sf packages into R environment.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse, spdep)
```

## Import Geospatial Data

### Import polygon features

This code chunk will import ESRI shapefile into R.

```{r}
hunan_sf = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
               layer = "Hunan")
```

### Import attribute data in csv

```{r}
hunan <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
